sentences.sentence: Push the suppository well up into the rectum with your finger.
sentences.translation: 用手指将药栓推入直肠。

sentences.sentence: Methods: Paracetamol hollow type suppository was produced by the model of HTS.
sentences.translation: 方法：用中空栓模具，制备了对乙酰氨基酚中空栓。

sentences.sentence: Objective to investigate the preparation technology of compound lidocaine hydrochloride suppository.
sentences.translation: 目的研究复方盐酸利多卡因栓剂的制备工艺。
